name: RogueAI
description:
Description

RogueAI is a fast-paced, action-packed endless arena game set in a post-apocalyptic world where players take on the role of a humanoid robot, fighting against other malfunctioning AIs. The game features a robotic-inspired and rustic aesthetic that immerses players in a world where machines have taken over, and the only hope for survival is to fight for control.

How To Play

Move - Mouse and Keyboard / Controller

Attack - LMB / B

Jump - Space / A

Dash - LSHIFT / RB

Credits

Sounds - weloveindies.com

Textrues - Quixel

Animations - Mixamo
